short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces every instance of the words Trump Supporter with the word Republican in your Chrome Browser

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces the text "Trump Supporter" with "Republican" in your browser so that your browser is more clear about what the Republican Party supports.
